rules_text: When Warrior of the Folded Fan dies, invigorate 2. [i](Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]When one of the Folded Fan falls, his brothers do not mourn. Instead, they fight with increased resolve to ensure his death was not in vain.[/i]
